info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 9:21PM EDT until June 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 920 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chase City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kells Corner around 930 PM EDT. Rehoboth around 940 PM EDT. Kenbridge around 1000 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gary, Bacons Fork, Wilburn, Spanish Grove, Loves Mill, Arvins Store, North View, Finneywood, Skipwith and The Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
